---
title: "Diagnostics (Sheets)"
execute: {echo: false, warning: false, message: false}
---

```{r}
library(readxl)
path <- "data/cv.xlsx"
if(!file.exists(path)) { cat("data/cv.xlsx not found\n") } else {
  sheets <- excel_sheets(path)
  cat("**Sheets in data/cv.xlsx:**\n\n- ", paste(sheets, collapse="\n- "), "\n")
}
```
